name: Adrián Lamo
known_for: Computer hacking, reporting Chelsea Manning to the Army's Criminal Investigation Command
notable_works: Appeared on ''Hackers Wanted'', ''We Steal Secrets'', ''Good Morning America'', ''Democracy Now!'', ''Aquí y Ahora (TV series)
criminal_penalty: Six months of house arrest, two years and six months probation, $64,938 restitution
